attributes.action: Ukrainian merchandise sold online should go to to the correct charities.
attributes.additional_details: Set up legislation that any merchandise for the Ukrainian flag, badges or lapel pins, that a percentage of the sale (70-90%)will be donated to the correct charities to help provide support for those families who have had to leave the country due to the current situation.
attributes.background: To ensure that all sales of merchandise with the Ukrainian flag sold on Amazon or relevant online websites is donated to charities that will assist with the refugee crisis currently unfolding in Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to buy, based on whether these are being sold for charitable reasons, are a matter for individual consumers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
